catalog_script_client.name: Set Duration for half day

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_3d0daa852ff2201046c0af5df699b6a6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Leave Request Input">529b5de02f6e201046c0af5df699b64e</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d5d91f172f22201046c0af5df699b69b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Duration for half day</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var halfday = g_form.getValue('half_day');
	
	if(halfday == 'true')
		{
			g_form.setValue('duration', '0.5');
		}
	else if(halfday == 'false')
		{
			g_form.clearValue('duration');
		}
	
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-08 11:24:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3d0daa852ff2201046c0af5df699b6a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Duration for half day</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_573698_lms">31afbb1c2f92201046c0af5df699b64e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">31afbb1c2f92201046c0af5df699b64e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3d0daa852ff2201046c0af5df699b6a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 11:48:27</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
